name: KONEElevatorCall
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: call me an elevator
Developer Terms of Use
des:
“Call the elevator from your home with the KONE Elevator Call skill for Amazon Alexa. This skill works in buildings equipped with the KONE Residential Flow smart building solution.” 

To set up the KONE Elevator Call Skill:
 1. Enable the skill and login with your KONE Residential Flow credentials
 2. Select your preferred elevator floor-call option:
 a. Fixed destination floor for elevator calls
 b. No predefined destination floor for elevator calls – Alexa will ask for a floor number each time you make a call
 3. Review terms and conditions, and submit

Basic Interactions
 Alexa, call me an elevator

Disclaimers
 i. A KONE Residential Flow account is required to use the KONE Elevator Call Skill
 ii. The KONE Elevator Call Skill is only available in buildings that are equipped with the KONE Residential Flow smart building 
 solution
 iii. The user must have the KONE Flow app installed (available from Google Play and App Store) and be logged into to their KONE 
 Residential Flow account to use the KONE Elevator Call Skill
 iv. Elevator calls are restricted according to the KONE Residential Flow building setup. Users cannot make elevator calls to floors 
 they are not permitted to access.
